Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.Staff Acrobat]{Staff Acrobat}

Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap} and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} the target.

source.value: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
